scene.name: Office desk with adapter
scene.description: Office desk with a monitor, mouse, power adapter, cables, and documents on the tabletop

state.relative: to the right of the monitor
front-left area of the keyboard zone
partially coiled near the power adapter

task.name: Move adapter and tidy cables
task.name_cn: 移动适配器并整理线缆
task.description: Multiple subtasks on the office desk
task.spoken_prompt: We will organize the office desk. Two subtasks: move the power adapter, then tidy the cables.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 我们要整理办公桌。两个子任务：先移动电源适配器，再整理线缆。

subtasks.description: Move the power adapter to the left side of the monitor and place it stably
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask one: move the power adapter to the left of the monitor and set it down securely.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务一：把电源适配器移到显示器左侧，稳稳地放好。

steps.description: Pick up the power adapter and move it to the left side of the monitor
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the power adapter and move it to the left side of the monitor.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起电源适配器，移到显示器左侧。

steps.description: Place the adapter flat and keep the cable relaxed
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: place the adapter flat and keep the cable relaxed.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把适配器平放，保持线缆松弛。

subtasks.description: Tidy the cables around the hub
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask two: tidy the loose cables around the hub.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务二：整理集线器附近的松散线缆。

steps.description: Gather the loose cables near the adapter and hub into one bundle and keep them relaxed
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: gather the loose cables near the adapter and hub into one bundle and keep them relaxed.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：把适配器和集线器旁的散乱线缆归到一起，并保持松弛。

steps.description: Place the bundled cables behind the monitor to keep the desk clear
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: place the bundled cables behind the monitor to keep the desk clear.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把整理好的线缆放到显示器后面，保持桌面整洁。

constraints.notes: Avoid blocking the mouse and keyboard; keep the cable loose.
